website_summaries.verdict: A well-made compact version of the game that is perfect for playing on the go. If you are looking for the game in miniature size, this is the one to get.
pros: Sturdy wood construction in a travel size game
Board folds and slides in place to protect pawns when not in use
cons: Seems a bit smaller in person than expected, but if you are looking for a highly portable model this is an appealing feature

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Pros - *Decently constructed *Easily portable *Compact, but not too small Cons - *When not in "play" set up, the rack doesn't lock closed to the bottom tray (This makes it easy for the game discs to fall out. Retain the plastic that the discs came in to make this less of an issue).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect summer and any time game.
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I discovered the item was better than reviewed and left out key benefits that I have found to be better than expected. Price is not the only item and yes this was a fantastic deal that you can’t find elsewhere. And yes I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great game that's simple but not easy!
customer_reviews.text: This wooden version is so worth the extra few bucks. Fun to play with kids and adults. More challenging than you might think!
customer_reviews.author: Taos Girl

customer_reviews.title: it was a complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It broke the first time I played it with my nephew, it was a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni

customer_reviews.title: Connect 4
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids love to play this game. Easy to set up and play and put away.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Widmer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So much fun. This is a well made, quality item that travels well.
customer_reviews.author: MsRSJ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, portable, well made wooden product!
customer_reviews.text: Great portable game in wood. I'm trying not to buy any more plastic products but still wanted a board game for hurricane season. It's compact, well made and looks nice
customer_reviews.author: K. Friderici

customer_reviews.title: SMALL
customer_reviews.text: Box had no english writing on it. And its smaller than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I do not like, it is too weak to get broken soon
customer_reviews.author: Chris Lee

customer_reviews.title: Quality sucks
customer_reviews.text: The whole thing is fragile and the make was not even close to acceptable. The holes are drilled at wrong places so I can see two coins through the same hole.
customer_reviews.author: sravani

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality. I like how it folds down and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. I like how it folds down and stores all the pieces. I also like that it’s made from wood and not cheap plastic. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Risner

customer_reviews.title: I really like this wooden game
customer_reviews.text: I really like this wooden game! It is easy to set up and put away. It is a bit smaller than I expected, but not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: jolie

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I used them for inside recess at an elementary school and the kids loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Bennington

product_meta.title: TANCH Travel 4-IN-A-ROW Board Games Wooden Foldable Line up 4 Game
product_meta.description:
contents: 
1.Game board 
2. 21 Red pawns 
3. 21 Blue pawns(pawns size are 2.5cm) 
Recommended Age:
5 years and up
feature_bullets: Durable, natural & environmental material: It is made of wood. It includes 21 red pawns, 21 blue pawns and a game board. Its size: 9.45"X5.9"X1.57" (24cmX15cmX4cm), the diameter of pawns is 2.5cm.
Educational game: It can improve children’s intelligence and enhance the communication between parents and children when they play with it together, which is conducive to the growth of children.
Foldable & portable toy: It’s easy to set up, store and carry. When done playing just put everything in the container to store it. You also can take it anyplace, great for travel.

How to play: Pull the game board out of the base and place it upright on its supports. Each player choose a set pawns and drop one pawn at a time in turns, the one who gets 4 in a (horizontal, vertical or diagonal) row first wins the game. It’s a strategy game, will bring you much more fun.
Wonderful gift for kids children adults seniors for any festival.
